snippet.title: Hearts of Iron IV: Waking the Tiger - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Read more and get the expansion here: http://pdxint.at/2HfwRuz

Are you ready to beat back the imperialist aggression of the world’s bullies? Waking the Tiger, the latest expansion to Hearts of Iron IV draws the players’ attention to the Chinese Front while making major improvements to many aspects of the game. As usual, the expansion will be released alongside a major game update that is freely available to all Hearts of Iron IV players.
